mapper.select: select l.id, r.id "re_id", m.name "wname", r.subject, r.member_id, r.img, r.content, r.readcount, r.like_count, r.date from recipe_board r join like_list l join member m where l.member_id=#{member_id} and r.id = l.recipe_board_id and r.member_id=m.id order by l.id desc
select count(*) from like_list where member_id=#{member_id}
